issue.title: Generate system info at boot time

content.raw:
How about:

* For fc1, fc2 and sim:
cloudsimd/launchers/vrc_contest.py line 614 in get_drc_script

* For the router
cloudsimd/launchers/vrc_contest.py line 373 in get_router_script

* For the cloudsim computer
cloudsimd/launchers/launch_utils/startup_scripts.py line 177 in get_cloudsim_startup_script


Let me know if you need anything else
content.html:
How about:

  • For fc1, fc2 and sim: cloudsimd/launchers/vrc_contest.py line 614 in get_drc_script

  • For the router cloudsimd/launchers/vrc_contest.py line 373 in get_router_script

  • For the cloudsim computer cloudsimd/launchers/launch_utils/startup_scripts.py line 177 in get_cloudsim_startup_script

Let me know if you need anything else
